review: I have tried so many items to stream our movies from Amazon Prime and other companies. This is so nice and small and easy to take with you on road trips. I do however thank the remote control could be designed a little better. But I have big fingers and every thing on the remote is small. The right left, up down are in the top circle and the band is a little small to my thinking. But I do love this thing.If you travel a lot and like watching your shows make sure and get this to take with you. It is very easy to set up and has a video tutorial built in. Great value too.

review: I don't know if this product is very shady. A friend highly recommended it. And I've used this about 4 times. I've wasted more time waiting and looking at "Loading", "network connection lost" every 30 seconds and other error messages. I have yet to watch anything with no problem for more than 15 mins. While all the other wifi devices works just fine. Its only about 15 ft away from the router. It shows very good signal and it drops. VERY VERY DISAPPOINTED.  I wish I can give this no star rating.
